name: Blizzard Brawl
description:
Blizzard Brawl is a fast-paced, Smash Bros-inspired fighting game. Join in with either keyboard or controller and destroy your friends with deadly snowballs, blasting them off the stage until the last stock is gone! We made this for a 3 day game dev challenge, and we made a fun video documenting the whole thing, which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/wLKqU40hlg4

This build of the game will always be free, the best way to support us is to just check out our YouTube and join discord to follow along with future projects.

Thanks for playing!

If you find bugs or have feedback, please let us know in our new Discord
https://discord.gg/pAP3KQ5RqE

CONTROLS

Keyboard
MOVE - WASD
THROW (hold to charge) - J
JUMP - K
SHIELD - I/L
START/PAUSE - ENTER/P

Controller
MOVE - LS
THROW (hold to charge) - X
JUMP - A/RB
SHIELD - LT/RT
PAUSE/START -  START
